description.displayText: Kids love Meaghan. For the past 2 years, Meaghan has worked with children ages 2-10 years in different classes at our church. She is patient, kind and fun. She is well-prepared whenever she is teaching. Meaghan enjoys being with children and it shows. She also interacts well with the parents. Meaghan is mature and super-responsible. I trust her with the children at our church. I highly recommend her.
